result.reason: Feature request to encrypt exported connection files (CSV/XML) which currently expose passwords in plain text — valid security enhancement
result.approach: Add an encryption password option to ExportForm UI, then apply the existing BlockCipherEngine encryption (already used for confCons.xml full-file encryption) to CSV/XML export output, and corresponding decryption on import

attempts.raw_output:
Based on the issue details, this is a feature request to add password encryption to the export/import functionality (CSV and XML exports currently expose passwords in plain text).
